dictionary.desc: [CRIME SCENE | FIRST KILL] Lincoln Park, Denver, Colorado 80204, United States Of America
dictionary.scene:
The local police department got information about dead body found in Lincoln park.
Body was mutilated and each limb was situated next to each other horizontally A green band was on victim left leg and at knee was written number 27 A yellow band was on victim left hand and at arm was written number 713 A red band was on victim right leg and at knee was written number 125 A blue band was on victim right hand and at arm was written number 27
Additionally in victim pocket police found note with this message: 'We got an intruder in house. I want the answer, the answer i currently gave you but in other form'
At the end of note there was an phone number. To pass this level you have to send message with answer to this puzzle. (use command sms [code])
dictionary.goodcode: After few seconds you get an reply message!
dictionary.acmds: Available Commands: files - explicit crime data sms [code] - send sms with code
dictionary.done: Congratulations You have passed to next level
